DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect television view like food .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Television Watching Liking Food
DOC.detailed_description: The objective investigation determine whether participant change like food base television view . The specific aim study : 1 . Determine effect television like food . 2 . Determine effect television like food .
DOC.criteria: Between age 18 35 year Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 kg/m2 24.9 kg/m2 Unrestrained eater ( ≤ 12 Three Factor Eating Questionnaire [ TFEQR ] ) Report favorable preference food serve meal include : macaroni cheese salad ( dress choose participant via initial phone screen ) , participant must rate food item ≥ 3 phone screen ≥ 50 visual analogue scale ( VAS ) initial screen session Regularly eat meal 10:00 Are able complete session within eight week screen session Report nonsmoker Are take medication affect appetite food intake Are pregnant breastfeeding Are dietary plan dietary restriction prevent consumption certain type and/or amount food Binge eating ; and/or Athletes train
